comments.author: glind@mozilla.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

1) OSX, with no installed printers.
2) print (from the delta ticket page... maybe via js?)
3) got print dialog, complained there was no printers
4) installed printer (in SF office)



Actual results:

Got a modal dialog that hogged/ blocked all tab focus / clicks while it downloaded the printer software.  


Expected results:

download should happen in parallel / non-blocking, and still allow other fx stuff to happen.  Might be OSX?  Might be us?
